  • Classes in sorcer.core used by sorcer.core 
    Class and Description
    AccessDeniedException
    Any interaction with the MonitorableServicer might result in this exception due to the following reason: unauthorized control of the running job/task.
    AdministratableProvider 
    ComprehensiveContextException 
    ContextMetaData 
    Monitorable
    All providers that need to be monitored implement this interface.
    Provider
    This is an interface that defines how a provider interacts with other code the through the methods that are exposed.
    SorcerConstants
    SORCER interface provides predefined constants, commands and parameter names for the SORCER metacomputing environment.
    UEID
    Sometimes it's critical to identify an exertion associated with a provider.
    UnknownExertionException
    Any interaction with the MonitorSessionManager might result in this exception due to the following reasons: The session does not exist, Some operations on this session which was not valid.
